name: Monochrom 3
description:
Monochrom series

- Uniball Signo UM-153 (gold) on A3 bristol board (300g/sqm), landscape
- Drawn using AxiDraw pen plotter
- generated with Javascript

Creation date: 5.10.2021

Purchase of this piece comes with getting a physical drawing. International shipping included.

Upon resale on the secondary market the physical drawing shall be sent to the new owner. Shipping will be covered by the new owner.
